General.Name: Admicom Oyj
General.Description: Admicom Oyj engages in the ERP cloud-based solutions in Finland. It also offers ERP system for building services, construction, and industrial sectors, accounting, and payroll services. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Jyväskylä, Finland.
